description.value:
Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Radiant

Standard

Reach 4

+36 vs AC; 2d8+12 damage, and the target takes ongoing 15 radiant damage (save ends).

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 4

+36 vs AC; 3d8+10 damage.

At-Will ✦ Teleportation

Standard

The dragon teleports 5 squares, makes a claw attack, teleports 5 squares, and makes a claw attack against a different target.

Recharge 5-6

Minor, Recharge

Reach 4

+34 vs Fortitude; 4d10+7 damage, and the dragon pushes the target 3 squares.

At-Will

Minor, At-Will

Ranged 10

The target takes a -2 penalty to all defenses against the dragon's attacks until the dragon uses this power on another target.

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Radiant

Standard

Close blast 5

+34 vs Reflex; 4d10+5 radiant damage, and the target is blinded (save ends). Miss: Half damage.

Encounter

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

Breath weapon recharges, and the dragon uses it

Encounter ✦ Radiant, Teleportation

Standard

Close burst 10

Targets up to four enemies; +34 vs Reflex; 4d8+5 damage, and the target takes ongoing 15 radiant damage and is dazed (save ends both). Effect: The dragon teleports to a space in the burst.

Encounter ✦ Fear

Standard

Close burst 10

Targets enemies; +34 vs Will; the target is stunned until the end of the dragon's next turn. Aftereffect: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).

At-Will ✦ Teleportation

Immediate Interrupt

Trigger: When the dragon is hit by an attack

The dragon gains a +4 bonus to all defenses against the triggering attack. If the attack misses, the dragon teleports 6 squares

system.biography:
HP 1120; Bloodied 560 ; see also bloodied breath
Resist 30 radiant 		Init +28 | AP 2 | Save +5
AC 45Fort 42Ref 44Will 42
Speed 12, fly 14 (hover), overland flight 18, teleport 10
Ability ScoresStr 28 (+24)
Con 24 (+22)		Dex 33 (+26)
Int 26 (+23)		Wis 28 (+24)
Cha 26 (+23)
Languages Common, Draconic, Supernal
Alignment Unaligned
Skills Diplomacy +28, History +28, Insight +29, Intimidate +28, Religion +28Senses Darkvision
Passive Perception 34 | Insight 39
